name: Animals Around The World - free educational puzzle for toddlers and kids
name_original: Animals Around The World - free educational puzzle for toddlers and kids
description:
Your Child is about to undertake a journey through the world of animals.

In the course of up to 15 scenarios, your Child will playfully get to know everything about animals, and will thus train his- or her- gift of imagination, intellect, skills and combination capacities.
